DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria All patient treat least one treatment Vectibix ( Panitumumab ) February 2004 April 2009 eligible study . Patients may may infusion reaction Vectibix ( Panitumumab ) . Major infusion reaction define rapid onset airway obstruction ( bronchospasm , stridor , hoarseness ) , urticaria , erythema , and/or hypotension , anaphylaxis . Minor infusion reaction define transient flushing rash , urticaria , dyspnea , drug fever . Patients receive treatment EGFR past eligible .
